channel.title: pass on Manuel Ohlendorf
channel.description: Recent content in pass on Manuel Ohlendorf

item.title: Sharing secrets with pass
item.description: I don’t like password managers. I don’t trust them. But when you work in a small team and use a lot of different servers and technologies you sometimes have to securely store and share a secret with them. There are a lot of password managers out there that can do that but I want a very simple command line tool that just uses standard technologies and — Tata — Pass, the standard unix password manager hits the spot.
